question:
According to the recently released SRS Bulletin, which of the following statements is/are correct?
  1. The Infant Mortality Rate (IMR) in India has declined in 2016 compared to that in 2015
  2. The highest IMR in 2016 was reported in Odisha
  3. The highest increase in IMR in 2016 in comparison to 2015 was reported in Madhya Pradesh
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The IMR of India has declined by 8% in 2016, from 37 per 1000 live births in 2015 to 34 per 1000 live births in 2016. <u>Second statement is incorrect</u>. The highest IMR in 2016 was reported in Madhya Pradesh (47) followed by Assam and Odisha (44), Uttar Pradesh (43) and Rajasthan (41). <u>Third statement is incorrect</u>. 5 states/UTs have shown an increase in IMR in 2016 while 29 States/UTs have shown a decline in IMR. State of Arunachal Pradesh has shown the highest increase in IMR (6 points) among states while Chandigarh has shown the highest (7 points) among UTs.
